definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: The hock joints are somewhat rounded, not small and sharp in contour.
sentences.chinese: 飛節略呈圓形，不能太小或輪廓過於銳利。

sentences.english: The play was abridged for TV.
sentences.chinese: 劇本經過節略，以拍攝電視片。

sentences.english: They are making further efforts to decrease military spending.
sentences.chinese: 他們正在做進一步的努力來略節略軍費開支。

sentences.english: By the way, the author abridged the above-mentioned story.
sentences.chinese: 順便提一下，作者節略了上述故事。

sentences.english: This is Who's Really Who skilfully capsuled.
sentences.chinese: 這是《名人實錄》一書的小巧的節略版。

definition: to whisper to one another's ear
to write on the blackboard/writing on the blackboard
altar lamp burning day and night
Later Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms (386-403)
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)
cups and dishes in complete disorder (idiom); after a riotous drinking party
to keep on the right side of everyone (idiom)/warm and affable
